CustomField.formula: IF(Call_List__r.RecordType.Name=='Collection AMFS' && TEXT(Status_Paid_Not_Paid__c)=='Y' && (TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Redemption Konven' ||TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Withdrawal'), APE_Convert__c ,IF(Call_List__r.RecordType.Name=='Collection AMFS' && TEXT(Status_Paid_Not_Paid__c)=='Paid' && TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) != 'Redemption Konven' && TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) !='Withdrawal',APE_Convert__c,0))
CustomField.label: Amount Paid
